sources.title: American Dresser | Full Drama Movie | Tom Berenger | Keith David | Gina Gershon
sources.description:
When a recent widower discovers a secret about his past, he and his best friend hop ride their motorcycles cross-country to confront his past, but unexpectedly discovers that life is about moving forward, one mile at a time.
2018. Stars: Gina Gershon, Keith David, Tom Berenger, Jeff Fahey, Kathrine Narducci, Bruce Dern

metadata.Plot: After the sudden death of his wife and a fractured relationship with his two daughters, John Moore along with his best friend Charlie Wylde, decide to ride their motorcycles from Long Island, New York to the West coast. In this modern day western, they are reminded of the beauty this country has to offer, encounter many interesting people, and unexpectedly discover something about themselves. "Life is a ride...one mile at a time."
metadata.Actors: Gina Gershon, Keith David, Penelope Ann Miller
